verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for Israel, <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which stretches <S%H5186><s%> forth the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and lays the foundation <S%H3248><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and forms <S%H3335><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> him.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a cup <S%H5592><s%> of trembling <S%H7478><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, when they shall be in the siege <S%H4692><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> will I make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a burdensome <S%H4614><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that burden <S%H6006><s%> themselves with it shall be cut <S%H8295><s%> in pieces, though all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> be gathered <S%H622><s%> together against <S%H5921><s%> it.

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I will smite <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%> with astonishment, <S%H8541><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> with madness: <S%H7697><s%> and I will open <S%H6491><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and will smite <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> with blindness. <S%H5788><s%>

And the governors <S%H441><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> in their heart, <S%H3820><s%> The inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be my strength <S%H556><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> will I make <S%H7760><s%> the governors <S%H441><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> like an hearth <S%H3595><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> among the wood, <S%H6086><s%> and like a torch <S%H3940><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> in a sheaf; <S%H5995><s%> and they shall devour <S%H398><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, <S%H1157><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> the left: <S%H8040><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> in her own place, <S%H8478><s%> even in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> also shall save <S%H3467><s%> the tents <S%H168><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> first, <S%H7223><s%> that the glory <S%H8597><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and the glory <S%H8597><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> do not magnify <S%H1431><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> defend <S%H1598><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and he that is feeble <S%H3782><s%> among them at that day <S%H3117><s%> shall be as David; <S%H1732><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> shall be as God, <S%H430><s%> as the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that I will seek <S%H1245><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> that come <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And I will pour <S%H8210><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and on the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of grace <S%H2580><s%> and of supplications: <S%H8469><s%> and they shall look <S%H5027><s%> on me whom <S%H854><s%> <S%H834><s%> they have pierced, <S%H1856><s%> and they shall mourn <S%H5594><s%> for him, as one mourns <S%H5594><s%> for his only <S%H3173><s%> son, and shall be in bitterness <S%H4843><s%> for him, as one that is in bitterness <S%H4843><s%> for his firstborn. <S%H1060><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be a great <S%H1431><s%> mourning <S%H4553><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> as the mourning <S%H4553><s%> of Hadadrimmon <S%H1910><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Megiddon. <S%H4023><s%>

And the land <S%H776><s%> shall mourn, <S%H5594><s%> every family <S%H4940><s%> apart; <S%H905><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> apart, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart; <S%H905><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%> apart, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart; <S%H905><s%>

The family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> apart, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart; <S%H905><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of Shimei <S%H8097><s%> apart, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart; <S%H905><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> that remain, <S%H7604><s%> every family <S%H4940><s%> apart, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart. <S%H905><s%>
